title: Update first two leaderboard artist names

requirements.text: Update the sample artist leaderboard data so that the first leaderboard entry (rank 1) has the artist name "Atif Aslam" and the second leaderboard entry (rank 2) has the artist name "Arijit Singh".

quotes: change the names to Atif Aslam in the first one , Arijit singh in the second

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSample.ts, the entry with rank: 1 has name: "Atif Aslam".
In frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSample.ts, the entry with rank: 2 has name: "Arijit Singh" (capitalization exactly as shown).

The Artist Leaderboard page renders these updated names in the first two rows without changing any other fields (id, rank, avatar URL, reachScore, previousReachScore, isTopTrending) for those entries.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the existing leaderboard data structure (Artist interface fields) unchanged.
nonGoals: Do not change the leaderboard layout, styling, theme, sorting, or any other artist entries beyond the first two names.
Do not add backend storage or persistence for leaderboard data.
